metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010174 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: CImg The CImg Library v.2.3.3 and earlier is affected by: command injection. The impact is: RCE. The component is: load_network() function. The attack vector is: Loading an image from a user-controllable url can lead to command injection, because no string sanitization is done on the url. The fixed version is: v.2.3.4.

criterions.comment: cimg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
gmic: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
